ABS training.name: Basic Crunches
ABS training.description: Lie on your back, lift your shoulders off the floor, and engage your core.

ABS training.name: Bicycle Crunches
ABS training.description: Alternate touching opposite elbow to knee while engaging the core.

ABS training.name: Leg Raises
ABS training.description: Lie on your back and lift your legs up while keeping them straight.

ABS training.name: Russian Twists
ABS training.description: Sit on the floor, lean back slightly, and twist your torso side to side.

ABS training.name: Reverse Crunches
ABS training.description: Lie on your back, lift your legs, and curl your hips off the ground.

ABS training.name: Plank
ABS training.description: Hold a push-up position with your forearms on the ground, keeping the body straight.

ABS training.name: Side Plank
ABS training.description: Lie on your side and lift your body off the ground, supporting yourself with one arm.

ABS training.name: Plank to Push-Up
ABS training.description: Start in a forearm plank, push up to your hands, then return to the forearm plank.

ABS training.name: V-Ups
ABS training.description: Lie on your back and simultaneously lift your arms and legs towards each other.

ABS training.name: Flutter Kicks
ABS training.description: Lie on your back and alternate small, fast kicks with your legs slightly above the ground.

ABS training.name: Scissor Kicks
ABS training.description: Lie on your back and cross your legs over each other in a controlled motion.

ABS training.name: Toe Touches
ABS training.description: Lie on your back, extend your legs up, and reach for your toes with your hands.

ABS training.name: Mountain Climbers
ABS training.description: In a plank position, quickly alternate bringing knees towards the chest.

ABS training.name: Dead Bug
ABS training.description: Lie on your back with arms and legs raised, lowering opposite arm and leg simultaneously.

ABS training.name: Superman Hold
ABS training.description: Lie on your stomach and lift your arms and legs off the ground, holding the position.

ABS training.name: Dragon Flag Progression
ABS training.description: Lie on your back, lift your entire lower body while keeping it straight, then lower slowly.

ABS training.name: Hollow Body Hold
ABS training.description: Lie on your back, lift your arms and legs slightly off the ground, keeping core engaged.

ABS training.name: Hollow Body Rocks
ABS training.description: Hold a hollow body position and gently rock forward and backward.

ABS training.name: L-Sit (Floor)
ABS training.description: Sit on the floor with legs extended and lift them off the ground using core strength.
